scripts.build: npm run build-firefox && npm run build-chrome && npm run build-apple
scripts.build-firefox: mkdir -p build/firefox/ && node scripts/inject.mjs firefox > build/firefox/inject.js
scripts.build-chrome: mkdir -p build/chrome/ && node scripts/inject.mjs chrome > build/chrome/inject.js
scripts.build-apple: mkdir -p build/apple/ && node scripts/inject.mjs apple > build/apple/contentScope.js
